verses.verse: It <S%G1161><s%> happened <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%> that they <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G846><s%> together <S%G2596><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> that <S%G5620><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> of Jews <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of Greeks <S%G1672><s%> believed. <S%G4100><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the disbelieving <S%G544><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> stirred up <S%G1892><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> embittered <S%G2559><s%> the souls <S%G5590><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the brothers. <S%G80><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G99999><s%> they <S%G1304><s%> stayed there a long <S%G2425><s%> time, <S%G5550><s%> speaking boldly <S%G3955><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who testified <S%G3140><s%> to the word <S%G3056><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> grace, <S%G5485><s%> <S%G2532><s%> granting <S%G1325><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%> to be done <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hands. <S%G5495><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> was divided. <S%G4977><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Part sided <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> part with <S%G4862><s%> the apostles. <S%G3303><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> <S%G99999><s%> some of both <S%G5037><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> their <S%G846><s%> rulers, <S%G758><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> a violent attempt <S%G3730><s%> to mistreat <S%G5195><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stone <S%G3036><s%> them, <S%G846><s%>

they became aware of <S%G4894><s%> it, <S%G2703><s%> and fled to <S%G1519><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> of Lycaonia, <S%G3071><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Lystra, <S%G3082><s%> Derbe, <S%G1191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the surrounding region. <S%G4066><s%>
There <S%G2546><s%> they preached the Good News. <S%G2258><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> Lystra <S%G3082><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G435><s%> sat, <S%G2521><s%> impotent <S%G102><s%> in his feet, <S%G4228><s%> <S%G5225><s%> a cripple <S%G5560><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>'s womb, <S%G2836><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> had walked. <S%G4043><s%>

said <S%G2036><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "Stand <S%G450><s%> upright <S%G3717><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> feet! <S%G4228><s%>" <S%G2532><s%> He leaped <S%G242><s%> up and <S%G2532><s%> walked. <S%G4043><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> When <S%G1492><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> had done, <S%G4160><s%> they lifted up <S%G1869><s%> their <S%G846><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> in the language of Lycaonia, <S%G3072><s%> "The gods <S%G2316><s%> have come down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in the likeness <S%G3666><s%> of men! <S%G444><s%>"

They <S%G5037><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> "Jupiter, <S%G2203><s%>" and <S%G5037><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> "Mercury, <S%G2060><s%>" because <S%G1894><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the chief <S%G2233><s%> speaker. <S%G3303><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> of Jupiter, <S%G2203><s%> whose temple was <S%G5607><s%> in front <S%G4253><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> brought <S%G5342><s%> oxen <S%G5022><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> garlands <S%G4725><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the gates, <S%G4440><s%> and would have <S%G2309><s%> made a sacrifice <S%G2380><s%> along with <S%G4862><s%> the multitudes. <S%G3793><s%>

But when <S%G191><s%> the apostles, <S%G652><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of it, <S%G1284><s%> they tore their <S%G846><s%> clothes, <S%G2440><s%> and sprang <S%G1530><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> crying out, <S%G1161><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> "Men, <S%G435><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> are you <S%G4160><s%> doing these things? <S%G5023><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> men <S%G444><s%> of like passions <S%G3663><s%> with you, <S%G5213><s%> and bring <S%G2097><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> good news, <S%G1994><s%> that you should turn from <S%G575><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> vain things <S%G3152><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> the sky <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that is in them; <S%G846><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the generations <S%G1074><s%> gone by <S%G3944><s%> allowed <S%G1439><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> to walk in <S%G4198><s%> their own <S%G846><s%> ways. <S%G3598><s%>

<S%G2544><s%> Yet <S%G1065><s%> he didn't <S%G3756><s%> leave <S%G863><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> without witness, <S%G267><s%> in that he did good <S%G15><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G2254><s%> rains <S%G5205><s%> from the sky <S%G3771><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fruitful <S%G2593><s%> seasons, <S%G1705><s%> filling our <S%G2257><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> with food <S%G5160><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gladness. <S%G2540><s%>"

Even <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, <S%G2664><s%> they hardly <S%G3433><s%> stopped the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> from <S%G3361><s%> making <S%G2380><s%> a sacrifice <S%G2380><s%> to them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> some Jews <S%G2453><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%> came there, <S%G1904><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> having persuaded <S%G3982><s%> the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> <S%G2532><s%> they stoned <S%G3034><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> and dragged <S%G4951><s%> him out of <S%G1854><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> supposing <S%G3543><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> was dead. <S%G2348><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> as the disciples <S%G3101><s%> stood around <S%G2944><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> he rose up, <S%G450><s%> and entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city. <S%G4172><s%> On <S%G2532><s%> the next day <S%G1887><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out with <S%G4862><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Derbe. <S%G1191><s%>

confirming <S%G1991><s%> the souls <S%G5590><s%> of the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> exhorting them <S%G3870><s%> to continue <S%G1696><s%> in the faith, <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> afflictions <S%G2347><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> they had appointed <S%G5500><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> for them <S%G846><s%> in every <S%G2596><s%> assembly, <S%G1577><s%> and had prayed <S%G4336><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> fasting, <S%G3521><s%> they commended <S%G3908><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> they had believed. <S%G4100><s%>
They passed through <S%G1330><s%> Pisidia, <S%G4099><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Pamphylia. <S%G3828><s%>
When <S%G2532><s%> they had spoken <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Perga, <S%G4011><s%> they went down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Attalia. <S%G825><s%>

From there <S%G2547><s%> they sailed <S%G636><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%> from where <S%G3606><s%> they had been <S%G2258><s%> committed <S%G3860><s%> to the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they had fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> they had arrived, <S%G3854><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> had gathered <S%G4863><s%> the assembly <S%G1577><s%> together, <S%G4863><s%> they reported <S%G312><s%> all the things that <S%G3745><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> had done <S%G4160><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> a door <S%G2374><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> to the nations. <S%G1484><s%>
They <S%G1161><s%> stayed <S%G1304><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> for a <S%G3756><s%> long <S%G3641><s%> time. <S%G5550><s%>
